code:
flowchart TD
    A[User Input] --> B[CLI Parser]
    B --> C[update_cmd.cmd_update]
    C --> D[scanner.scan_installed_skills]
    D --> E[Get all installed skills]

    E --> F{For each skill}
    F --> G[registry.lookup_skill]
    G --> H[Compare SHAs]
    H --> I{Outdated?}
    I -->|Yes| J[installer.install_skill]
    I -->|No| K[Skip]
    J --> L[Summary Report]
    K --> L
